summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 2, Gardner J. Gwinn's Addition, being the alley lying easterly of Bothell Way and extending from East 77th Street to 14th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10375 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of Payment by Bonds.
